Module org.nasdanika.html.bootstrap
Package org.nasdanika.html.bootstrap

Interface BootstrapFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultBootstrapFactory
public interface BootstrapFactory
Factory for creating bootstrap UI elements.
Author:
Pavel

    • formGroup

      FormGroup formGroup(Object label, Object input, Object hint, Map<Breakpoint,Size> horizontalLabelWidths)
      Parameters:
      label -
      input -
      hint -
      horizontalLabelWidths - If not null and not empty, a horizontal form group is created as explained here - https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.5/components/forms/#horizontal-form with label widths taken from the map and control widths computed as 12 - label width.
      Returns:

      Parameters:
      htmlPage -
      theme - Bootswatch theme, uses default theme is null or Default.
      Returns:

    • bootstrapCdnHTMLPage

      HTMLPage bootstrapCdnHTMLPage(Theme theme)
      Creates an HTML page with Bootstrap stylesheet and scripts served from CDN.
      Parameters:
      theme - Bootswatch theme. Uses the default Bootstrap theme if null or Default.
      Returns:

      element -
